about_the_game:
A short story about a mysterious incident in the North of Transylvania and the punishment suffered by its culprit. Are you ready to learn more secrets and terrifying things that a creature is capable of doing in the world of Diastone?

Diastone: Confusion is a spin-off of the Diastone game series. This game offers you an opportunity to discover details from previous games and to learn about new events in which the creature has been involved; information that has been absent for centuries. In the game, an unusual old corridor will be repeated over and over again. To progress through the game, you will need to pay attention to the changes that occur in the rooms.

Features:

  • Traverse the ever-changing corridor
  • Explore all the details that change in the room
  • Everything in the game will repeat again and again if you aren't attentive enough
  • Enjoy the exploration mechanics using a controller.
  • Immerse yourself in the game's world, thanks to high-quality sounds and graphics.

Evil is approaching...

content_descriptors.notes: The content contains scenes of violence, self-harm; scenes that provoke fear, and may be unacceptable to individuals with mental trauma and a weak heart.
